title: Attakai tte, Gohoubi da.
original_name: あったかいって、ごほうびだ。
sinopse: A televised Japanese McDonald's commercial for their upgraded Gracoro Burgers. Gracoro is short for [potato] gratin and croquette/korokke. The patty is a gratin croquette filled with macaroni and seafood. This year the Gracoro Burgers are now thicker (with more filling) and a beef demi-glace cheese topped version is also available for this winter only.
